post.text: There is absolutely NO DOUBT that Crooked Hillary is a PATHOLOGICAL LIAR. Even the liberal media is calling her out! She's a security risk and admits she "short circuited" -- UNBELIEVABLE! There is no question she is COMPLETELY UNQUALIFIED to be President. #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

comment.author: Shelby
comment.text: Why are you going to endorse Clinton supporter Rhino Ryan when he refuses to fully endorse or support you?? EFF Ryan!! I hope he loses in Wisconsin!! #VeteransForTrump

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: Shelby, in order to win our next President Mr. Trump needs to unite the Republican Party. Ryan is the Speaker of the House which an important role. He must try. So, as a supporter we need to trust Mr. Trump on this. This morning in Fox the pollster guy said there are five things that Mr. Trump need to do in order to win the White House and one was uniting the party. I don't like Ryan either but supporting Trump's decision. Thank you.
